description: This file is an ESLint configuration setup for a Vue.js project using TypeScript. It defines configurations for linting Vue files (.vue), TypeScript files, and test files, while also specifying ignore patterns. It imports various plugins and preset configs, and exports a default configuration object using defineConfigWithVueTs.

methods.name: defineConfigWithVueTs
methods.description: Function used to define the ESLint configuration object specific to Vue + TypeScript projects
